thread.title: Hope alive for Ofori as scan reveals AIK Stockholm man did not break a bone
thread.title_full: Hope alive for Ofori as scan reveals AIK Stockholm man did not break a bone

title: Hope alive for Ofori as scan reveals AIK Stockholm man did not break a bone
text:
16:40 CET Hope alive for Ofori as scan reveals AIK Stockholm man did not break a bone - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and AIK youngster Ebenezer Ofori 
Ghana and AIK Stockholm youngster Ebenezer Ofori has been boosted with news that his injury picked up against Halmstad is a minor one and he could be in contention against Gothenburg this weekend. 
The 20-year-old youngster has been splendid in the Swedish league this season for AIK Stockholm and it was feared that he had broken his leg after a nasty collision during a league game against Halmstad. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
